spec_data.Name: perl-Inline-Files
spec_data.Description:
Inline::Files generalizes the notion of the `__DATA__' marker and the
associated `<DATA>' file handle, to an arbitrary number of markers and
associated file handles.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:33:50 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Allows for multiple inline files in a single perl file
